name: Egg Bird
description:
Follow Egg Bird, the last known purebred chick in a world where KFC has taken over, run by laser shooting cyborg chickens. Traverse the lands in Egg Birds journey to liberate the earth and avenge Egg Birds fallen comrades in this eggcelent adventure.

Egg Bird is a puzzle game where the objective is to make the least amount of moves as possible to reach the end.
The theme "out of control" comes when you can go negative with the amount of moves you can make, but at the expense of hp.
